17:41 <mflorea> has quit  
17:44 <vmassol> cleaning spam on myxwiki.org  
17:49 <vmassol> tmortagne: can I remove http://myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Test/Template ? You barely escaped my antispam cleaning ;)  
17:50 <tmortagne> vmassol: can't even remember what it was about but you can delete it for sure  
18:02 <vmassol> ok done I've cleaned only the main wiki  
18:11 <tmortagne> vmassol: no IRC bot it seems  
18:16 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> has joined #xwiki  
18:19 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
18:19 <vmassol> tmortagne: the irc bot is only for xwiki.org  
18:20 <tmortagne> I tough it was xwiki.org actually  
18:30 <vmassol> hi ClemensR, how are you doing? :)  
18:30 <vmassol> just noticed http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Make+All+Wiki+Tables+Sortable+Macro which seems very nice  
18:30 <ClemensR> Hi Vincent, quite ok, but busy as usual :(  
18:30 <vmassol> so nice that I think it would make sense to have such a  macro by default in XE  
18:30 <vmassol> yeah :)  
18:30 <ClemensR> yep, a customer asked be to do that  
18:30 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
18:30 <vmassol> I'll probably send some proposal on the devs list  
18:30 <ClemensR> so I thought I might publish it as well  
18:30 <vmassol> in coming days  
18:31 <vmassol> what would be awesome would be to have a usage example + screenshot on that page  
18:31 <ClemensR> implementation is a bit of a hack, of course  
18:31 <ClemensR> yeah, I could not use the actual site ... but should be easy to mock up  
18:31 <vmassol> I guess you're just using a $jsx.use() and adding the styles  
18:32 <vmassol> I mean (% class="grid sortable filterable doOddEven" %)  
18:32 <ClemensR> yes, just that  
18:32 <vmassol> k  
18:32 <ClemensR> add it via javascript and rerun the init script  
18:32 <vmassol> it's very useful for users I tihnk  
18:32 <ClemensR> oh, really no screenshots :(  I  forgot  
18:32 <vmassol> because going through a LT is just too complex for simple tavles  
18:32 <vmassol> \*tables  
18:33 <vmassol> and it feels like a basic usage that could benefit from being in XE by default  
18:33 <vmassol> and we already have the tablefilterNsort.js already in platform  
18:34 <vmassol> (+ the images)  
18:34 <vmassol> but it's not very usable right now  
18:35 <ClemensR> yes, that made implementing the macro quote easy .... hm, cannot install it on 8.3 :(  
18:35 <ClemensR> s/quote/quite/  
18:35 <vmassol> weird  
18:37 <ClemensR> oh, some certificate issues  
18:37 <ClemensR> "unable to find valid certification path to requested target", sure some local install nonsense on my side  
18:44 <vmassol> mail sent  
18:45 <vmassol> ClemensR: maybe check your version of java8?  
18:45 <ClemensR> ah, jep, likely a bit old  
18:45 <vmassol> in 8.3 we added an HTTPS repo  
18:45 <vmassol> extension repo that is  
18:45 <vmassol> and we made a mistake in 8.3 for old java 8 versions  
18:45 <vmassol> which we fixed only after  
18:45 <vmassol> ie for 8.3.1 and 8.4  
18:46 <vmassol> maybe you're hitting this problem  
18:46 <vmassol> checkign if we mentioned it in the R  
18:46 <vmassol> RN  
18:46 <ClemensR> yup, it is 1.8.0\_77  ...  
18:47 <vmassol> you need 101 I think  
18:47 <vmassol> (min)  
18:47 <vmassol> or use a more recent build  
18:47 <vmassol> it's mentioned here: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/8.3/  
18:47 <ClemensR> yes, forgot the release notes, thats why, should have thought about that  
18:47 <ClemensR> I see it just now ... updating ...  
18:49 <xwikiorg\_guest\_8> has quit  
19:00 <ClemensR> looks like the "Improved Not Found Screen" is a duplicate in the RN ;)  
19:00 <ClemensR> ah, no it is not, it is just an improvement of another another also added in 8.4 ...  
19:06 <ClemensR> darn, the macro is not visible in the wysiwyg editor, makes it hard to do screenshots  
19:07 <vmassol> hmm sounds like sometihng to fix  
19:07 <vmassol> wysiwyg should be … wysiwyg… :)  
19:08 <ClemensR> yeah, and as the macro does nothing visible by itself, only include styles .... it is not visible in the editor  
19:08 <vmassol> at least you could show the syntax/uage of the macro  
19:08 <vmassol> + a screenshot in view mode  
19:08 <ClemensR> yep, that is easier (except for the typos in the description, I see now ... never mind :D )  
19:09 <vmassol> ClemensR: that's because the wysisyg controls the css/js it loads I think  btu that's a problem that we need to fix IMO  
19:09 <vmassol> we have a similar issue with LT I think  
19:09 <vmassol> actually not exactly the same  
19:09 <ClemensR> if a macro does nothing, just showing a cog icon to  open it would be nice  
19:10 <ClemensR> I guess I just cannot focus on it to open the macro editor  
19:10 <ClemensR> never mind I just add a new one, snapshot the edit step and the result  
19:16 <tmortagne> has quit  
19:29 <ClemensR> ok, must be good enough for today ... more fixes tomorrow if needed  
19:30 <ClemensR> has quit  
19:43 <edvorg> has quit  
20:44 <dmd-> has joined #xwiki  
20:45 <dmd-> when PUTting a new page via REST, how can I include a link like [[foo>>http://example.com]]?  If I leave the >> as is, I get a content representation error and a 400. If I escape it, I get the literal escaped version.  
20:48 <dmd-> never mind, my error

20:53 <dmd-> has quit
